Pragmatic Programmers SARL-AU

      About Pragmatic Programmers SARL-AU

      Mission

      We build trustworthy digital products that withstand rigorous reviews from platform owners, auditors, and enterprise procurement teams. Our mission is to deliver software that feels polished, secure, and sustainable from day one.

      Areas of Expertise

      • Product discovery and technical road-mapping
      • Native and cross-platform mobile development
      • API design, microservices, and event-driven backends
      • AI-assisted workflows and data-driven products
      • Observability, automation, and developer tooling

      Technologies

      Swift, Kotlin, TypeScript, React, React Native, Flutter, Python, Ruby, Go, Node.js, SQL/NoSQL databases, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

      Philosophy

      1. Pragmatic craftsmanship: Ship maintainable code that balances innovation with reliability.
      2. Transparency: Provide clear status, measurable progress, and audit-ready documentation.
      3. Security-first: Embed privacy, compliance, and operational safeguards into every build.
      4. Long-term partnerships: Support teams through launch, scaling, and ongoing optimization.

      For engagements or due diligence requests, contact mohamed.boufnichel@prag-prog.com.
